data: Once upon a time—But what author will venture to begin his tale so now-a-days?—Obsolete! tedious!—Such is the cry of the gentle, or rather ungentle reader, who wishes to be plunged at once, _medias in res_, according to the wise advice of the old Roman poet.
Specimens of German Romance; Vol. II. Master Flea
E. T. A. (Ernst Theodor Amadeus) Hoffmann
